subject: Attention New Members
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-1222667361-1175445840=:16821
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hello to everyone that is joining our group. Feel free to jump in on the conversations, ask questions or just look around. For those of you who would like to see what people are up to you may want to set your group settings to "individual email" settings for the postings otherwise you will not recieve message attachments of thier evp sound files. Most file sharing is done this way here.
   
  Misty

 
---------------------------------
Be a PS3 game guru.
Get your game face on with the latest PS3 news and previews at Yahoo! Games.
